sentences.en: A white cross was painted on the door.
sentences.cn: 门上画着白十字架。

sentences.en: A white cross was painted on the door. ＃
sentences.cn: 门上画着白十字架。

sentences.en: acrylic and oil paints
sentences.cn: 丙烯酸颜料和油画颜料

sentences.en: brightly painted houses
sentences.cn: 粉刷得很亮丽的房屋

sentences.en: brightly paintedhouses
sentences.cn: 粉刷得很亮丽的房屋

sentences.en: Broughton took a sickie on Monday to paint his fence.
sentences.cn: 布劳顿星期一称病请了一天假来粉刷栅栏。

sentences.en: Children, many with their faces daubed with paint, ran among the vehicles.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在车辆中间跑来跑去，许多脸上都涂着油彩。

sentences.en: He had painted all the wood with metallic silver paint.
sentences.cn: 他给所有的木材都涂上了一层闪耀着金属光泽的银漆。

sentences.en: I frequently paint between 10 and 20 insets for my murals.
sentences.cn: 我经常会为我的壁画画上10到20个嵌套图画。

sentences.en: I lay the painting flat to stop the wet paint running.
sentences.cn: 我把油画平放以防止未干的颜料流动。

sentences.en: My room needed a lick of paint to freshen it up.
sentences.cn: 我的房间只要刷一点油漆就能焕然一新。

sentences.en: Rust and flaking paint mean the metalwork is in poor condition.
sentences.cn: 生锈和掉漆说明金属配件损毁严重。

sentences.en: The blue base gives the red paint more depth.
sentences.cn: 蓝色底色将红色涂料衬托得愈加浓重。

sentences.en: The ceiling needs painting.
sentences.cn: 天花板需要粉刷了。

sentences.en: The front door needs a new coat of paint.
sentences.cn: 前门需要刷一层新漆了。

sentences.en: The living room was painted in pastel shades of pink and blue.
sentences.cn: 起居室被漆成淡雅的粉色和蓝色。

sentences.en: The surface corrosion was worst where the paint had flaked off.
sentences.cn: 油漆剥落的地方表面腐蚀最为严重。

sentences.en: The wagon's paint was badly chipped on the outside.
sentences.cn: 马车外边油漆斑驳。

sentences.en: The walls had been horribly vandalized with spray paint.
sentences.cn: 墙壁被用喷漆喷得一塌糊涂。

sentences.en: The walls have been horribly vandalized with spray paint.
sentences.cn: 墙上被人用喷漆涂得乱七八糟。

sentences.en: They started to mend the woodwork and paint the walls.
sentences.cn: 他们开始修补木建部分，粉刷墙壁。

sentences.en: Turner is famous for painting landscapes.
sentences.cn: 特纳以风景画闻名。

sentences.en: We got some paint remover and scrubbed it off.
sentences.cn: 我们弄了一些油漆清除剂，把它清理掉了。

words.tran_cn: 描画的；着色的；刷上油漆的
画家的；美术的；开放式画风的
油漆（paint的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 油漆；油画颜料；油性涂料
油漆店，油漆行；油漆车间
塑料涂料；塑料漆；塑性涂料

trans.tran_en: a liquid that you put on a surface, using a brush to make the surface a particular colour
tubes or dry blocks of a coloured substance, used for painting pictures

trans.tran_cn: 给…上油漆，（用颜料）绘画，涂，抹，描绘
trans.tran_en: to put paint on a surface
